00001 <h2>Instructions</h2>
00002 
00003 <p>
00004         Drop PollMaker Widget into <code>~/Library/Widgets</code> (that's the Library folder located in your home folder, preferred)
00005         or <code>/Library/Widgets</code>.
00006         Safari users, relax! You'll be prompted to automatically install the widget after download. I wish all was that easy...
00007         Activate Dashboard, drag the widget to your screen and enjoy! 
00008 </p>
00009 
00010 <h3>Poll of the day</h3>
00011 <p>
00012         The widget shows the currently active poll. Click on an answer to cast your vote.
00013         Votes are updated in real time, so you'll see
00014         the result of your opinion!
00015  </p>
